reportText:
--- FINDING ---
Title: Apache 2.4.49 Path Traversal
Severity: High
Impact: High
Likelihood: Medium
CVSS: 9.8
EPSS: 0.76
Description: Improper path normalization leads to traversal.
--- END ---
--- FINDING ---
Title: OpenSSH CBC Mode Ciphers Enabled
Severity: Medium
Impact: Medium
Likelihood: Medium
CVSS: 5.3
EPSS: 21%
Description: Legacy CBC ciphers can expose sessions to cryptographic weaknesses.
--- END ---
--- FINDING ---
Title: SMB Signing Not Required
Severity: Low
Impact: Low
Likelihood: Medium
CVSS: 3.7
EPSS: 0.08
Description: Missing SMB signing increases relay attack exposure in segmented labs.
--- END ---
--- FINDING ---
Title: Exposed Management Interface
Severity: Critical
Impact: Critical
Likelihood: High
CVSS: 9.1
EPSS: 76%
Description: Administrative interface is reachable from untrusted segments.
--- END ---
